messages.message_text: Hi Rida, I'm Zaid. I would like to schedule a counseling session with you to discuss my anxiety issues. Can you please let me know your availability?
Hi Zaid, thank you for reaching out to me. I have availability on Thursday at 2 PM. Would that work for you?
Thursday at 2 PM works for me. Thank you, Rida!
Hi Samantha, I'm Zaid. I would like to schedule a couples therapy session with you and my wife to work on our communication issues. Can you please let me know your availability?
Hi Zaid, I would be happy to help. Can you please give me your wife's name and your preferred date and time for the session?
Sure, her name is Aisha. How about next Monday at 3 PM?
Monday at 3 PM works for me, Zaid. I will add this to my calendar and send you a confirmation email shortly. Looking forward to seeing you and Aisha!
Hi Jonathan, I'm Zaid. I would like to quit smoking and need help. Can you please let me know what kind of counseling sessions you offer?
Hi Zaid, I offer cognitive behavioral therapy to help people quit smoking. We can work together to identify your triggers and develop coping mechanisms. Does that sound good to you?
Yes, that sounds great. How often do we need to have these sessions?
I recommend weekly sessions to start with, and then we can adjust the frequency as needed. Does that work for you, Zaid?
Yes, that works for me. How do I schedule our first session?
You can call my office and we can schedule your first session at a time that works for both of us. I'm looking forward to working with you, Zaid.
